attacks.name: Fire Fang
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

ability.name: Burning Fighter
ability.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may discard the top 5 cards of your deck. If any of those cards are {R} Energy cards, attach them to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

ability.name: Resolute Flame
ability.text: This Pokémon's attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon for each of their Pokémon-GX and Pokémon-EX in play.

attacks.name: Fiery Blast
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Singe
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

ability.name: Natural Cure
ability.text: Whenever you attach an Energy card from your hand to this Pokémon, remove all Special Conditions from it.

attacks.name: Lunge
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

ability.name: Firestarter
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a {R} Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Fire Stream
attacks.text: Discard a {R} Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Infinity
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage for each basic Energy card in your discard pile. Then, shuffle those cards into your deck.

attacks.name: Damage Rush
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Heat Assist
attacks.text: Attach up to 3 {R} Energy cards from your hand to your Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Darmani-Hands
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 50 more damage for each heads.

attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon isn't Burned, this attack does nothing.

attacks.text: You may attach up to 5 {R} Energy cards from your hand to your Pokémon in any way you like. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Ring of Fire

attacks.name: Hydro Pump

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

ability.name: Commotion
ability.text: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on each of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Wild Tail
attacks.text: You may discard any Stadium card in play.

attacks.name: Sweep Away
attacks.text: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck.

ability.name: Downpour
ability.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a {W} Energy card from your hand.

attacks.name: Riptide
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each {W} Energy card in your discard pile. Then, shuffle those cards into your deck.

ability.name: Wash Out
ability.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a {W} Energy from 1 of your Benched Pokémon to your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hydro Pump
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of {W} Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bubble Shoot
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage times the amount of {W} Energy attached to this Pokémon to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

ability.name: Submerge
ability.text: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks (both yours and your opponent's).

attacks.name: Aurora Wave
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Aqua Split
attacks.text: This attack does 40 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

ability.name: Murmurs of the Sea
ability.text: Your {W} Pokémon can't be Confused. If those Pokémon are already Confused, remove that Special Condition.

attacks.name: Water Pulse
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

ability.name: Meet Up
ability.text: Your Wishiwashi-GX in play get +20 HP, and their attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Mini Earthquake
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

ability.name: Weed Out
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may choose 3 of your Benched Pokémon. Then, discard your other Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dark Destruction
attacks.text: You may discard an Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Wrap
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 60 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Giga Impact
attacks.text: This Pokémon can’t attack during your next turn.

attacks.name: Dragonporter GX
attacks.text: Put 3 {N} Pokémon from your discard pile onto your Bench. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Sonic Edge
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

ability.name: Dragon Guard
ability.text: Prevent all effects of your opponent's attacks, except damage, done to your {N} Pokémon. (Existing effects are not removed.)

attacks.name: Sand Tomb
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

ability.name: Fight Song
ability.text: Your {N} Pokémon's attacks do 20 more damage to the Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

ability.name: Dragon Lift

name: Blaine's Last Stand
text: You can play this card only when it is the last card in your hand.\n\nDraw 2 cards for each Fire Pokémon you have in play.

name: Dragon Talon
text: If the Dragon Pokémon this card is attached to is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if that Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 3 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Fiery Flint
text: You can play this card only if you discard 2 other cards from your hand.\n\nSearch your deck for up to 4 Fire Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Lance ◇
text: You can play this card only if 1 of your Pokémon was Knocked Out during your opponent's last turn.\n\nSearch your deck for up to 2 Dragon Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Switch Raft
text: Switch your Active Water Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If you do, heal 30 damage from the Pokémon you moved to your Bench.

name: Wela Volcano Park
text: Whenever a player flips a coin for the Special Condition Burned between turns, that Special Condition isn't removed even if the result is heads.

text: You can play this card only if 1 of your Pokémon was Knocked Out during your opponent's last turn.\n\nAttach up to 2 basic Energy cards from your hand to 1 of your Dragon Pokémon.
